title: 38 of the best Christmas gifts for fitness and wellness lovers, including Fitbits, crystals and sports gear
text:
For many, Christmas is a time for mince pies and mulled wine, but we all have fitness fans in our lives who favour a five mile run over tipple.

And those same people probably prefer a good wellness box over Quality Streets, or possibly picking a new compression top rather than a tie out of their stocking.

From general well-being to unique gear, get your sporty loved ones something they'll cherish for a long time by looking through our list of Christmas gifts for fitness fanatics.

Here's a round-up of the best fitness gifts for Christmas 2019.

Best gifts for cyclists
